name: CWConfiguration
desc: Encapsulates an immutable configuration for an AirPort WLAN interface.

items.name: init(configuration: CWConfiguration)
items.desc: Creates and returns a CWConfiguration object initialized with the given CWConfiguration object.

items.name: var networkProfiles: NSOrderedSet
items.desc: An array of remembered CWNetworkProfile objects.

items.name: var rememberJoinedNetworks: Bool
items.desc: AirPort client will remember all joined networks.

items.name: var requireAdministratorForAssociation: Bool
items.desc: Require an administrator password to change networks.

items.name: var requireAdministratorForIBSSMode: Bool
items.desc: Require an administrator password to create a computer-to-computer network.

items.name: var requireAdministratorForPower: Bool
items.desc: Require an administrator password to change the interface power state.
